segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and I’m terrified he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and it’s making my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and someone is going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and it’s like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pooling, and it’s only a matter of time before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balance is terrible, and I’m just waiting for the crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of the most dangerous situations I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
